remarks: A Dirichlet character restricted to the unit group of ` Z/nZ ` is a group homomorphism into the multiplicative group of nonzero complex numbers.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Apr-2016.)
statement:
dchrghm.g $e |- G = ( DChr ` N ) $.
dchrghm.z $e |- Z = ( Z/nZ ` N ) $.
dchrghm.b $e |- D = ( Base ` G ) $.
dchrghm.u $e |- U = ( Unit ` Z ) $.
dchrghm.h $e |- H = ( ( mulGrp ` Z ) |`s U ) $.
dchrghm.m $e |- M = ( ( mulGrp ` CCfld ) |`s ( CC \ { 0 } ) ) $.
dchrghm.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. D ) $.
dchrghm $p |- ( ph -> ( X |` U ) e. ( H GrpHom M ) ) $.
